definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: The thesis introduced a set of computer distributed control system of fuel boiler in the industry.
sentences.chinese: 論文介紹一種工業燃油鍋爐計算機集散控制系統。

sentences.english: Out of the frying-pan into the fire.
He dumped chunks of raw, pink meat into the oil, which sputtered furiously.
sentences.chinese: 他把大塊的生肉扔到滋滋響的油鍋裏。

sentences.english: But now, I seem to have gone from the frying pan into the fire.
sentences.chinese: 可我現在感覺，自己是剛出油鍋，又進火坑。

sentences.english: Low the coated banana pieces into the heated oil and deep fry them until golden in color.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢將它們放入燒熱的油鍋裏炸至金黃色。

sentences.english: In a flat bottom pan, heat up the oil on medium heat.
sentences.chinese: 中火燒熱油鍋，熱鍋，勺入一滿大勺的麪糊。

sentences.english: Don't you realize we've jumped out of the frying pan into the fire?
sentences.chinese: 你難道不明白我們這是跳出了油鍋卻掉進火坑了嗎？

sentences.english: Turn off the gas if your pan of oil catches fire.
sentences.chinese: 如果油鍋着火，關掉煤氣。

sentences.english: Fried in the pan, add Minced meat.
sentences.chinese: 放入油鍋炒熟，加入絞肉泥一併炒熟。

sentences.english: Never bite straight into a roll, and refrain from cutting it in half and buttering.
sentences.chinese: 不要直接咬一卷麪包或將它只切成一半就放進油鍋煎。

sentences.english: Heat wok with oil, add, ginger, spring onion, bell pepper, and cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 加熱油鍋，入姜蔥，紅椒和白菜幫翻炒。

sentences.english: The hot oil splashed out of the pot.
Pan-fry in hot oil until golden brown.
sentences.chinese: 將牛肉卷放入油鍋炸至金黃即成。

sentences.english: Six fat sausages sizzling in the pan.
sentences.chinese: 六根胖香腸在油鍋裏面滋滋響。

sentences.english: Heat up a pan with oil over the medium fire. Stir in prepared scallions until fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 中火燒熱油鍋，放入蔥段爆香。

sentences.english: Heat up a pan with oil over the medium fire.
sentences.chinese: 中火燒熱油鍋，放入蔥段爆香。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
